Jews are not promoting brain washing their children in military training camps, teaching them how to blow themselves up and cause maximum deaths of Jews and other non-Muslims!

Jews won't hijack planes, nor kill athletes at the Olympics or blow themselves up in German restaurants. There is not a single Jew that has destroyed a church. There is not a single Jew that protests by killing people. Jews don't traffic slaves, nor have leaders calling for Jihad and death to all the Infidels.

Perhaps the world's Muslims should consider investing more in basic education and less in blaming the Jews for all their problems.

Muslims must ask "what can they do for humankind" before they demand that humankind respect them!!

Regardless of your feelings about the crisis between Israel and the Palestinians and Arab neighbors, even if you believe there is more culpability on Israel 's part, the following two sentences really say it all:

"If the Arabs put down their weapons today, there would be no more violence. If the Jews put down their weapons today, there would be no more Israel" - BB.=(Benjamin Netanyahu)

This says it all!! I wish I could understand why people must die if they pray to a different God than theirs (any and all religions).:ball:

I wish I could see the looks on the faces of those turned away from the pearly gates thinking that being a cold-blooded killer will get them in.

Insular people have traits and diseases exclusive to them.

Or, better yet, why not ask a Jew?

But let's go back to your original posting . . . you never bothered to figure out the veracity to any of it, not to mention never made an attempt to take it apart to see if it had any basis of logic, right?

1- This is your proof? Weak at best :spank:

2- Wow, why didn't I think of that o No:

3- Simple comparison, nothing further needed, followed by a statement that I agree with.

Simply disagreeing with me doesn't make a weak point of yours correct.

But as I am Jewish, I feel I can speak from some basis of knowledge.

Like all "simple" things that come to your In box, there's enough truth to appear correct to people who don't know anything about the subjectmatter, yet appealing to your biases so you can be convinced it's true.

This is why you're being taken to task for posting BS propaganda. The fact that you're attempting to promote it as 100% true without any acknowledgment that its origins are suspect shows the level of discourse you're willing to subject yourself (and us) to. That's like looking for something stupid on TV - it ain't worth it.
